t: What is Amazon Nova? - Amazon Nova
s: Amazon Nova is a new generation of foundation models that deliver frontier intelligence and industry leading price performance, available on Amazon Bedrock. Amazon Nova models include four understanding models, two creative content generation models, and one speech-to-speech model.
